headline: Investor Alert: Robbins LLP Informs Investors of the AppLovin Corporation Class Action Lawsuit
summary: SAN DIEGO, March 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Robbins LLP informs stockholders that a class action was filed on behalf of all investors who purchased or otherwise acquired AppLovin Corporation securities...

headline: APP Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that AppLovin Corporation Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
summary: NEW YORK, March 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Attorney Advertising-- Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC, a nationally recognized law firm, notifies investors that a class action lawsuit has been filed...
